name: GuGo
tag_list: social, network, health, interaction, deals, facebook, google, groupon, scvngr, path
overview:
GuGo is a group-centric social intelligence platform where one can interact with friends or family in a fresh and private way.

As well as having discounts from all deal sites efficiently arranged and accessible according to one’s Preferential Data, there will also be a special section showcasing GuGo’s very own free deals. Local events of similar interest will also be available with the click of a button. For each deal or event participated in, points will be received that can then be redeemed for monetary rewards.

GuGo is also designed to build a better bridge between people and corporations, charities, colleges & universities, social & volunteer groups, and all other types of organizations by bringing all of their information and current events into one place.

The GuGo experience will maximize one’s time spent communicating with others in an enriching, fun, and rewarding way. This level of human interaction, social well being, and happiness is what GuGo is all about!
